message.body: Hi!
How's it going?
Good. Just wasting time on the internet when i could be doing schoolwork haha
But in all fairness, i finished a big assignment early.
How are u?
Ah, the best kind of procrastination
I'm just trying to recover from my weekend haha
And worst. 2 hours just went by haha
Haha mine wasnt too rough. Do u have to be at work in the morning?
No, just class in the afternoon and work in the evening. Mornings and I don't get along too well haha
Haha me either. I am definitely more of an evening person, yet i prefer to get things done in the morning so that i have the afternoon to myself (work, gym, etc)
Are u still in undergrad or are u in grad school?
Undergrad, starting my last year in fall
Very cool. Well enjoy it while it lasts! It goes by toooo quickly :(
Haha definitely trying to. Are you in grad school?
Yep. Just started. Are u a ling major?
Yep, with a minor in italian studies. You?
ds my MAT.
What r your plans for after college?
I majored in linguistics with minors in french and religious studies. I also got a certificate in arabic language and linguistics. I am now working towar
